nodes.text: Anhur was a male humanoid who was a field commander in the Republic Military during the Galactic War. During the invasion of Belsavis, Anhur was the chief of security at the Prison Geothermal Collectors in the High Security Section and led a contingent of soldiers and Jedi in defending the generators, but was killed in an Imperial assault.
Field Commander Anhur appears on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, as a major enemy that must be defeated in the Imperial Heroic mission "Lights Out."
